name: Spice Digger
description:
In my first year participating in 7DRL (7-Day Roguelike Challenge), I decided to keep things simple. As a dad with two kids under 3 and a full-time job with an awful commute, it's tough to get anything done.

Spice Digger has the player controlling Ritz the Robot, sending him down into spice dungeons to collect spice for fun and profit. As the player progresses further into the spice dungeons, they will face balancing the temptation of gathering more spice vs the mortality of their own existence.
